eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LAW ENFORCEMENT WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Oscoda, MI; AT 08:46 AM ON OCT 09, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 05:02 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
The Oscoda County Sheriffs Office and the Michigan State Police K9 Unit are currently  searching for a male suspect who may be armed in the area of Adheek Trail in Mio.

Please avoid this area and keep doors locked until further notice and report any suspicious activity to 911

Thank you for your cooperation and assistance in keeping our community safe
